name: Unity Lighting Tutorial (Built-In Render)
description:
Learn how to setup believable lighting in Unity using the Built-In Render pipeline. Note this is not for URP or HDRP.

Click here for the tutorial document

https://docs.google.com/document/d/1C0Ixv-HWfp8HHWAcB1EqXn5ynWId366JlhW5VZNtBcI/...

Assets used

Textures from Textures.com

https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/tools/input-management/mini-first-person-c...

https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/2d/textures-materials/nature/grass-and-flo...

https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/vegetation/trees/conifers-botd-142076

https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/environments/flooded-grounds-48529

Download tutorial files below
